title: Adventure & Comfort

questions.text: My ideal definition of adventure is...
choices: Exploring remote places off the beaten path
Trying new experiences in familiar settings
Comfortable enjoyment with a touch of newness

questions.text: When traveling, I'm most excited about...
My comfort zone is something I...
choices: Actively push myself to expand regularly
Step out of when the opportunity feels right
Value and protect - it exists for a reason

questions.text: When faced with something scary but exciting, I...
choices: Feel the fear and do it anyway
Carefully assess if it's worth the risk
Usually decide it's not for me

questions.text: My approach to trying new hobbies is...
choices: Jump in enthusiastically with full commitment
Try it a few times to see if I like it
Stick to hobbies I already know I enjoy

description: Explore your balance between excitement and coziness.
